title: Going Serverless: Using Vercel Functions for our Notion Twitter App
description:
It's time to go SERVERLESS. DevOps and Infrastructure management takes a crap ton of time. While we await Elon's new twitter API, we're getting ahead of the curve and setting up our new notion twitter app on Vercel Serverless functions.

Feel free to ask any question and let me know if you'd like me to share the source code as I build out this application from a simple python app to a fully hosted, automated, autogenerating, scheduled app.

Stay focused.
Keep Building.


üê¶ See the tweets generated by this app in real time:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IndyDevDan
Notion: https://indydevdan.notion.site/Notion-Twitter-App-4665d65a36a946b4b21d15ef9adcf19f
